comment: I learned nothing about English in this class. All we talked about was the Matrix and some political organization. This class is very boring and hard to pass because none of the work makes any sense or even relates to English! I took it my first year of college. AWFUL!!

Hmmm...she is as about as liberal and anti-Christian as a professor comes nowadays. Weird, opinionated lady. Some of her comments were somewhat disturbing. If you pretend to like her, you'll get an 'A'. After I wrote a piece about my faith, she decided I was a 'B' student. She seems to be an adequate teacher. Just tellin' it like it is...

Very helpful teacher, great person. She is a tutor, and a darn good one at that. She is very witty, likes to challege you, is interesting. Yes she seems opinionated but so what. I think she has a soft side as well but just doesn't want to show it to anyone.
Canceled class often for whatever reason, lots of random assignments through email, taught from the movie, The Matrix, which was pretty dumb.
I don't like her
she doesnt make the class interesting enough for the student, and there were some pointless assignmests as well.

Professor Rigg is a very stubborn and opinionated woman. She has an Irish accent and a sense of humor that will leave you guessing what she'll do next. She is the type of person that can look right through you and see into your soul. Creepy, huh? But she knows what she's talking about and is very personable if you just try.
Very improvised and stubborn. She has difficulties understandings different points of view. The class is easy, though.
AVOID THIS LADY!!!, MAN SHE MAKES YOU WORK A LOT!!!. I summitted a paper about the cave and she wants you to think like her!!! Only good thing was the movie the matrix!!!

Absolutely amazing teacher. Very real and down to earth. Makes you realize more about yourself than you ever thought before. Watch current movies and write papers on real life issues. No textbook. Quite funny and very personable. taking her again next semester for Eng. Comp II
bad teacher. takes favorites and blows everyone else off and is very rude to students
Gives poor directions for assignments, then gets angry when students don't follow the unclear directions.

Very opinionated and stubborn. But overall a good teacher, she will help you out a lot if you go talk to her. I highly suggest that you go see her at least once outside of the class. I took her twice and made A's both times.

Prof. Rigg is opinionated, and she is also not open minded. However, if you show an effort and you're nice to her she'll be nice to you. I had an injury (with no excuse) which prohibited me from attending the last two classes and she excused me with no penalty. The key to success is to agree with everything she says and I promise you a good grade.

Dont get too caught up with what she has to say regarding off-subject matters.  She will help you with great care with English matters, especially on grammer and passing the Regents test.  Great for non-native speakers.

HOLY CRAP this was the worst class I have ever taken. I am a good writer-I have won contests, etc. She doesn't seem to think so because my opinions do not coincide with hers. I got zeros on essays for the wording of my title. Avoid at all costs unless you feel like commiting suicide.

This professor says that her class is a non opinionated class but yet she persists on telling her opinion and not letting her class tell her their opinions. Not only is she a horrible professor but she also descriminates against other peoples religions and does not allow them to back their choices.
No Comments

She appeared horrible at first but after the initial students dropped out of her class she became very lax.  I enjoyed the class discussions and she let the students get things done in their own time.  She treated the class like adults and granted certain individuals more time based on necessity.
She was ok, but extremely opinionated.  I learned a lot about the liberal mindset, but I learned little about reality.  NIce and pretty helpful lady though.

She is humorous but gets off track frequently, but the assignments are doable. People that complain about the nature of her class simply procrastinate. All your assignments for the next month are handed to you, and you simply discus in class. If your working behind the sceens due dates are no prob
Doesn't seem to do much work.  Class to her is watching a movie and then writing a portfolio about it on our own time.  Treats you like your in middle school.
your best bet for this class is to sit in the corner with your mouth shut and not listen to a word she says about anything. you will have a much better day as a result

Worst English teacher I ever had. She never gave exact due date and just annouced like a burden. I have to start and finish a portfolio in 3days. There's no time management for her. She's horrible. Try to avoid this teacher.

Never really gave dates of when things were due until like a week before it was due. She was a major hypocrite in the sense that she preached her liberal, socialist propaganda but shut you up, by saying she was offened if you disagree. anything will offen

this teacher likes to tell you what to think, she also likes to express how "smart" she is howmuch you are not. she likes to ask questions that the answer is your opinion but if your opinion is not hers then it is wrong. avoid this professor.

Horrible. Says she's unbiased, that's the biggest load of Crap. Not understanding to situations. Feels that she graded base on personal differences.  She grades not on Puncuation Grammar but also, on syntax and what your sentences could mean.

Gives useless porfolio's compared to other professors.  In my class, which she replaced the teacher, she was very VAGUE.  she expected us to know about certain parts of the useless porfolio that she didnt tell us in class.
Very opinionated but interesting
